billhistory.lastaction: 03/23/2015 H Referred to Human Services: Mar 23 2015 1:07PM
billhistory.caption: Relating to the study of the fiscal impact on local governments in Dallas, Ellis, Hunt, Kaufman, Navarro and Rockwall Counties of restructuring the NorthSTAR behavioral health system and the effective implementation the Sunset Commission Health and Human Services Commission Issue 9 recommendation.
billhistory.authors: Rose | Spitzer | Davis, Yvonne | Sheets | Giddings
billhistory.coauthors: Alonzo | Anchia | Anderson, Rodney | Ashby | Clardy | Coleman | Cook | Flynn | Johnson | Longoria | Naishtat | Zerwas
